thread.title: Eversource Marathon 2015 - Courant Community

author: courant.com
title: Eversource Marathon 2015 - Courant Community
text:
Caption Hartford Marathon 2015 Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant Hartford Marathon-HARTFORD-Jonas Hampton ccrosses the line to win the Eversource Hartford Marathon. Melanie Stengel/Special to the Courant
Hartford Marathon-HARTFORD-Jonas Hampton ccrosses the line to win the Eversource Hartford Marathon. Melanie Stengel/Special to the Courant
(Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant) Hartford Marathon 2015 Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant Erica Jesseman, of Scarborough, Maine won the women's Eversource Marathon in 2:41:41. This is her fourth win.
Erica Jesseman, of Scarborough, Maine won the women's Eversource Marathon in 2:41:41. This is her fourth win.
(Melanie Stengel / Special to the Courant) See more galleries Sports Local Guy Jonas Hampton Wins The Hartford Marathon Sports No Challenger For Harbert Okuti In Half Marathon This Year Hartford Honoring Or Supporting Loved Ones Among Motivations For Running Hartford Marathon
